H0.text: Electrical energy is required for a television set to work.

H1.text: Heat is the form of energy required for a television set to work.

H2.text: Light is the form of energy required for a television set to work.

H3.text: Solar is the form of energy required for a television set to work.

A4.text: Further environmental concerns related to television design and use relate to the devices' increasing electrical energy requirements.
